thread.title: Live coverage: Seattle Mariners introduce Scott Servais as new manager
thread.title_full: Live coverage: Seattle Mariners introduce Scott Servais as new manager

author: Seattle Times staff
title: Live coverage: Seattle Mariners introduce Scott Servais as new manager
text:
Live coverage: Seattle Mariners introduce Scott Servais as new manager Originally published October 26, 2015 at 10:15 am Updated October 26, 2015 at 9:55 am Follow our live coverage from Safeco Field as the Mariners introduce new manager Scott Servais to the Seattle media. By Seattle Times staff 
The Seattle Mariners on Friday announced that Scott Servais would become the team’s manager under new general manager Jerry Dipoto. Follow our live coverage above from Servais introductory press conference Monday at Safeco Field. The event is scheduled to begin at 10:30 a.m. Pacific. Seattle Times staff
